org.springframework.context.interceptor
Class EventPublicationInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
        |
        +--org.springframework.context.interceptor.EventPublicationInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationContextAware, InitializingBean, org.aopalliance.intercept.Interceptor, org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor
public class EventPublicationInterceptor
extends ApplicationObjectSupport
implements org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor, InitializingBean

Interceptor that knows how to publish ApplicationEvents to all ApplicationListeners registered with ApplicationContext

Version:

afterPropertiesSet

public void afterPropertiesSet()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: InitializingBean
Invoked by a BeanFactory after it has set all bean properties supplied.

This method allows the bean instance to perform initialization only possible when all bean properties have been set and to throw an exception in the event of misconfiguration.

Specified by:
